attributes.action: Get Theresa May to listen to the people NOW. Not the views of 2016.
attributes.background: The prime minister is not listening to anyone and going her own way. Referring to a referendum that happened in 2016 as the will of the people. We need the will of the people and the young ones who were unable to vote. Get our p.m. to listen to the people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235138
